title: Data Science in the Public Sector #1
description: Fun, free online workshop on doing data science in the public sector.
contents:
Get excited! runapp will host its first public event on Wednesday 7 April, when R superstar Miles McBain leads a discussion about doing data science in the public sector.
Sign up for free to attend this Zoom event at Eventbrite.

title: Welcome to runapp
